```{r, wrangling}
# set up T3 inflammation data
df.blood = df.blood %>% 
  drop_na(IL.1b_MFI) %>% 
  select(ELS_ID, Timepoint.T3, Sex, age_s2.T3,
         contains("tscore"),
         -contains("RADS"),
         114:127)
```
